> implemented
> > > > and how they work in the

> > > > Anyone else looked at the webpage and have any

> or

> > > > That is something I feel was missing from this
> game.
> > > > And the private space
> > > > sounds good too.
> > > > Thoughts?
> > > > luv,
> > > > -Su
